snippet.title: Interactive Trailer - Introduction - Orcs Must Die!
snippet.description:
! - Annotations must be turned on for this demo to work properly.

Welcome to a unique interactive gameplay video featuring Robot Entertainment's PC and Xbox LIVE Arcade game, Orcs Must Die!™ This demo video is the next best thing to playing the game! The video allows viewers to choose traps between successive waves of enemies with each choice changing the final outcome. The 30 possible avenues for completing the demo highlight the enormous variety of methods to kill orcs and defend your towers.

This first video gives you a quick tour of the level and lets you make your first choice before unleashing the first wave of enemies. 

Orcs Must Die! is now available: http://www.robotentertainment.com/games/orcsmustdie/download

Orcs Must Die! is an action-strategy game that challenges players to defend fortresses under siege. With a wide variety of traps and weapons to choose from, Orcs Must Die! dares players to find the best ways to hack, launch, flatten, gibletize, and incinerate an endless army of filthy orcs and their vile allies. Orcs Must Die! features a vibrant look, addictive gameplay, and a blatant disregard for the welfare of orcs. Orcs Must Die! will be available exclusively as a digital download on personal computers and Xbox LIVE Arcade this October.

Additional information can be found at www.OrcsMustDie.com.
